title: The Curse of La Llorona
short_cast: Linda Cardellini, Raymond Cruz, Patricia Velasquez, Marisol Ramirez, Sean Patrick Thomas, Roman Christou, Jaynee-Lynne Kinchen, Tony Amendola
cast: Linda Cardellini, Raymond Cruz, Patricia Velasquez, Marisol Ramirez, Sean Patrick Thomas, Roman Christou, Jaynee-Lynne Kinchen, Tony Amendola
m_desc: Suitable for persons aged 16 and above and under parental guidance for people under age of 16
desc: In 1970s Los Angeles, a troubled single mother discovers some folktales are true when a dark entity with sinister intentions pursues her children.
